title: Service disruption due to train fault on East West Line

title_translations.zh-Hans: 东格兰东线列车故障导致服务中断
title_translations.ms: Gangguan perkhidmatan kerana kerosakan kereta api di Laluan Timur Barat
title_translations.ta: கிழக்கு மேற்கு பாதையில் ரயில் பழுது காரணமாக சேவை இடையூறு

updates.text: [EWL] CLEARED: Defective train brought back to depot. Normal service resumed.
[EWL]:Estimate 15 mins additional travelling time from #OutramPark  to #JurongEast towards JooKoon due to train fault.Service still running.
